column5: Welcome to my 2,700 sq. ft. house. You get a private Bedroom and Living Room. The living room is in the room next door upstairs with a couch, Big screen TV , computer desk, computer, refrigerator and microwave. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the neighborhood, great restaurants close by, the comfy bed, the coziness, and the kitchen. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and furry friends (pets). There is a huge covered patio in back. Free Internet and Netflix.
